
::: {#suppfig-pvd_chosen_subtypes_linegraphs}

```{r}
figs =
  extract_figs_from_pickle(
    size.y = size.y,
    n_s = n_s_selected,
    dataset_name = dataset_name,
    output_folder = output_folder) |>
  rlang::set_names(paste("Subtype", 1:length(figs)))
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-pvd_chosen_subtypes_linegraphs-1
```
